attributes.review: One morning I was browsing the Internet when I saw an ad for this app💁🏽‍♀️ I thought I would download it to see what kind of weight loss program it offered because the advertisement showed an extremely overweight hideous looking orange monster creature🤮🎃 so I assumed that was a before picture💩 I downloaded the app to see the after pics🧞‍♂️ and much to my dismay there was no after😵 he currently looks like that and he is the president of our country🤒 I felt an extremely cold breeze rush through my entire home🍃🌬 when I quickly realized this app had taken my roof so I ran to my neighbors house in the poured rain🌧 only to see that they had all died😭so I checked their phones to see who I could contact and they had died minutes after they downloaded this app *jaw drops* I Imediately became overtaken by fear for my own life and my families👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾 I quickly called the men from the hardware store and they put my roof back on but told me that I would have to sacrifice my dad to satan✡️☦️ to pay them back🧿 all this app has done for me is made me burn my dad alive killed my neighbors and forced me to poke out my own eyes but it doesn’t stop there *sheds single tear* still fearful for my own life I ran to my cousins dad’s grandpa‘s sons step daughters pet rabbits baby daddies grandmas tinder hook up’s bartenders house to ask for help and some BrĘd💸💸💸but instead he’s slapped me with a dead fish shoved his hand down my throat and pulled my tonsils out⚒but than I had a realization💡that I needed to delete the app so I did and now that it is gone woolly mammoth‘s have came back to life 🤯🥳💞and help with global warming my dad ashes came back to life⚱️🤸🏻 and now he’s alive again and Jeffree star gave me his house🍬🥳😭🤗🥰 so if you delete this app and give it a one star rating all of your dreams will come true🧚‍♀️✨🌸💞 now I’m swimming in a pool of Louis Vuitton bags thanks to my good luck after leaving this terrible horrible disgustingly stinky nasty app review that it deserves😘 The end (NONE OF THAT WAS MADE IT ALL HAPPENED TO ME YESTERDAY)

attributes.review: once my app was downloaded I got a notification. I first thought the app was glitching but then I realized it wasn’t and it said the notification was meant for me. it told me that I didn’t have enough privilege that I was to be separated from my family and kept at a concentration camp. at first I was confused and I didn’t know if this was serious because no one was reacting. I was surprised that no one heard about this and that they were trying to hide the fact that this was happening from everyone. Then app started chanting Donald Trump and I started crying in confusion. I had to find privilege and I didn’t know where to get it. but I found the answer. I had to buy wheat thins and bleach my skin. I started sweating and getting itchy from the bleach. then Trump came up to me and gave me a bottle. he told me “wear this”. I stared at p and realize it was a foundation bottle. but it wasnt my shade so i started doing my own make up. I started to see the confusion in his eyes turn into rage. he told me that I was supposed to only put make up on for men and the way they liked it because it could never be a hobby for girls. he started calling me slurs and pointing features on my body. I said I’m sorry I didn’t know I hurt a man. I forgot theyre more important than women will ever be. I pulled out his orange foundation and contoured myself into an orange. he began acknowledging my skills and telling me to do his makeup. i started off with the signature ronald mcdonald foundation and lipstick. i said thats clownery luv lets go to the circus together.
attributes.title: horrible
